heading: breaking protocol
subheading: forget y2k. ipv6 is here – the net’s first major upgrade ever. 60000000 05a0591a 10800000 00000000 00080800 200c417a 00000000 00000000 00000000 12800001 as the last days of 1999 tick off and the mother of all bug fixes is in its final hours, the internet engineering task force (ietf), networking managers, and backbone operators are beginning […]
author: nick montfort
